summary: Memorandum for the record of a meeting with Dr. MIRO Cardona discussing propaganda campaigns, underground activities, commando plans, requests for arms, information on arms received by Castro regime, a proposal for the Council to go to Cuba and establish a government on Cuban soil, views about judges and lawyers, members of the Revolutionary Council, probable Argentine rupture of relations with Cuba, attendance to Homage to LACERDA, Propaganda Commission, views relative to Supreme Court Justice or PRIO being recognised as Head of a Provisional Government, offices of Council, and coordinating the activities of other exile groups.
title: Meeting with Dr. MIRO Cardona on 6 October
